docs.snippet: Adeiny Hechavarria had two hits and drove in a run during a decisive five-run rally in the eighth inning to help the Miami Marlins beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 6-3 on Tuesday night....

headline.main: Marlins Use Big Eighth to Beat Pirates 6-3
headline.print_headline: Marlins Use Big Eighth to Beat Pirates 6-3

docs.lead_paragraph: Adeiny Hechavarria had two hits and drove in a run during a decisive five-run rally in the eighth inning to help the Miami Marlins beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 6-3 on Tuesday night.

docs.snippet: Disease experts weigh in on Ebola cure as a second patient arrives in U.S. for experimental treatment. Mana Rabiee reports....

docs.snippet: A spokesman for the airport in Halifax, Nova Scotia, says a United Airlines Boeing 777 airliner on its way to Brussels from the U.S. has made an emergency landing after a fire on the aircraft....

headline.main: United Flight Makes Emergency Landing in Canada
headline.print_headline: United Flight Makes Emergency Landing in Canada

docs.lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the airport in Halifax, Nova Scotia, says a United Airlines Boeing 777 airliner on its way to Brussels from the U.S. has made an emergency landing after a fire on the aircraft.

docs.snippet: Johnny Cueto threw his fourth complete game of the season and the Cincinnati Reds, aided by a bizarre play in which a Cleveland runner was fooled by a second ball on the field, defeated the Indians 9-2 on Tuesday night....

headline.main: Bizarre Play, Cueto Help Reds Down Indians 9-2
headline.print_headline: Bizarre Play, Cueto Help Reds Down Indians 9-2

docs.lead_paragraph: Johnny Cueto threw his fourth complete game of the season and the Cincinnati Reds, aided by a bizarre play in which a Cleveland runner was fooled by a second ball on the field, defeated the Indians 9-2 on Tuesday night.

docs.snippet: Local police and federal soldiers rescued 39 Central American immigrants on Monday at a residence in the northern border state of Tamaulipas, state security authorities said in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.main: Mexico Rescues 39 Kidnapped Central American Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Mexico Rescues 39 Kidnapped Central American Immigrants

docs.lead_paragraph: Local police and federal soldiers rescued 39 Central American immigrants on Monday at a residence in the northern border state of Tamaulipas, state security authorities said in a statement on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: In “A Fuller Life,” staged readings recount the lengthy career of the director Samuel Fuller....

docs.abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Samantha Fuller documentary film A Fuller Life.

docs.snippet: Republican U.S. Rep. Kerry Bentivolio, considered by some to be an "accidental" congressman, was easily defeated Tuesday in a Michigan district and became the third U.S. House incumbent to lose his seat this year....

headline.main: Michigan GOP US House Incumbent Loses Primary
headline.print_headline: Michigan GOP US House Incumbent Loses Primary

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican U.S. Rep. Kerry Bentivolio, considered by some to be an "accidental" congressman, was easily defeated Tuesday in a Michigan district and became the third U.S. House incumbent to lose his seat this year.
